validations.minLen: This field must have at least {min} characters.
validations.minValue: This field must have a minimum value of {min}.
validations.maxValue: This field must have a maximum value of {max}.
validations.maxLen: This field must have at most {max} characters.
validations.url: This Fixed URL must start with http|https:// and should be within 6-128 characters.
